article_title: Hawley brings attorney general aspirations to Rolla
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: Josh Hawley, a GOP candidate for attorney general,  was the guest speaker of the Republican Women of Phelps County, yesterday at Penelope's restaurant. He calls himself a "constitutional lawyer" and he's focused on religious liberty. "We have a decision to make," he says. . . .
article_metadata.author: John Buckner jbuckner@therolladailynews.com
